title: Subtract
text: Subract $$x^{\frac{1}{2}}$$ from both sides, and we get the equation $$3x^{\frac{3}{4}}-x^{\frac{1}{2}}=0$$.

title: Add
text: Add $$1$$ to both sides, and we get $$3x^{\frac{1}{4}}=1$$.

title: Divide
text: Divide both sides by $$3$$, and we get $$x^{\frac{1}{4}}=\frac{1}{3}$$.
speech: Divide both sides by  3 , and we get , x raised to the 1 fourth power is equal to 1 third .

title: Reciprocal
text: Raise both sides to the power of 4(reciprocal of the exponent on the left side), and we get $$x={\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)}^4$$.
